Title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
Overview: A timid magazine photo manager who lives life vicariously through daydreams embarks on a true-life adventure when a negative goes missing.
production_companies: New Line Cinema, Ingenious Media, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Samuel Goldwyn Films, Big Screen Productions, Red Hour Films, TSG Entertainment, Down Productions
Cast: Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Patton Oswalt
